metadata.description: Name of the the environment which is used to generate a short unique hash used in all resources.
Primary location for all resources
When false, the template will NOT create a new App Service Plan. Set to true to allow creating one when no existing plan name is provided.

openAISystemMessage.defaultValue: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information.

metadata.description: Id of the user or app to assign application roles
When false, role assignments will not be created. Set to true to enable RBAC creation.

variables.appServicePlanId: [if(and(not(empty(parameters('appServicePlanName'))), not(empty(parameters('appServicePlanResourceGroupName')))), extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, parameters('appServicePlanResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Web/serverfarms', parameters('appServicePlanName')), if(not(empty(parameters('appServicePlanName'))), extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, if(not(empty(parameters('resourceGroupName'))), parameters('resourceGroupName'), format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').resourcesResourceGroups, parameters('environmentName')))), 'Microsoft.Web/serverfarms', parameters('appServicePlanName')), if(parameters('allowAppServicePlanCreation'), resourceId('Microsoft.Web/serverfarms', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').webServerFarms, variables('resourceToken'))), '')))]
variables.logAnalyticsWorkspaceId: [if(not(empty(parameters('logAnalyticsName'))), extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, if(not(empty(parameters('resourceGroupName'))), parameters('resourceGroupName'), format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').resourcesResourceGroups, parameters('environmentName')))), 'Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces', parameters('logAnalyticsName')), resourceId('Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces', format('log-{0}', variables('resourceToken'))))]

metadata.description: Creates a user-assigned managed identity.

value.AZURE_OPENAI_ENDPOINT: [reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, if(not(empty(parameters('openAiResourceGroupName'))), parameters('openAiResourceGroupName'), if(not(empty(parameters('resourceGroupName'))), parameters('resourceGroupName'), format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').resourcesResourceGroups, parameters('environmentName'))))), 'Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts', if(not(empty(parameters('openAiResourceName'))), parameters('openAiResourceName'), 'cog-5b5qpqbzmgmdu')), '2023-05-01').endpoint]

resources.name: [parameters('name')]
resources.identity: [if(parameters('managedIdentity'), createObject('type', if(not(empty(parameters('userAssignedIdentityId'))), 'UserAssigned', 'SystemAssigned'), 'userAssignedIdentities', if(not(empty(parameters('userAssignedIdentityId'))), createObject(format('{0}', parameters('userAssignedIdentityId')), createObject()), null())), createObject('type', 'None'))]

metadata.description: Creates an Azure Functions app.
The name of the function app.

The runtime stack for the function app.

Global flag to allow creation of role assignments

Name for WEBSITE_CONTENTSHARE (e.g., <app>-content). Leave empty to skip.
